queries.text:
from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Download")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Circuit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Download")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Bandwidth")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "Upload")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Utilization")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["Type", "_time"])

  |> sort(columns: ["_value", "Device"], desc: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "Device"])
  |> top(n:9, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Overload")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> last()
  |> group(columns: ["Type", "_time"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: r._value}))
  
  |> sort(columns: ["_value", "Device"], desc: true)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "Device"])
  |> top(n:9, columns: ["_value"])

from(bucket: "libreqos")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "Overload")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["Type"] == "Parent Node")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")
